Headline: Glasser: Pompeo is trying to please Trump by 'trolling the media'
Article_Body: Susan Glasser, a friend of Mary Louise Kelly, says Kelly is "a journalist of unimpeachable integrity." Regarding Mike Pompeo's criticism of Kelly, "he is someone who is aiming, it seems to me, at an audience of one with this public performance art around trolling the media," Glasser says. John Avlon and Oliver Darcy also join.
